definition: third plenum of a national congress of the Chinese Communist Party
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The 3rd Plenary Session decided on two things.
sentences.chinese: 當年的三中全會決定了兩件事。

sentences.english: At the Third Plenary Session in 1950, I spoke against hitting out in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 一九五零年，我在三中全會上說過，不要四面出擊。

sentences.english: The Third Plenary Session formulated or, one might say, reaffirmed the Party's ideological line.
sentences.chinese: 三中全會確立了或者說重申了黨的思想路線。
